file.name: routes.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.2
info:
  title: Example OpenAPI Definition for routes
  description: This is the routes description
  version: '1.1'
paths:
  /ping:
    get:
      summary: Your GET endpoint
      tags:
        - Base Route
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/pingResponse'
        '400':
          description: Bad Request
          content:
            application/problem+json:
              schema:
                $ref: 'errors.yml#/components/schemas/ProblemResponse'
      operationId: get-ping
      description: Description of Ping
      parameters:
        - schema:
            type: string
            minLength: 0
            maxLength: 20
          in: query
          name: responseWith
          description: response with this message

components:
  schemas:
    pingResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        response:
          type: string
      required:
        - response
tags:
  - name: Route
  - name: Base Route
